content: andy the llama knitting pattern by amanda berry email fluffandfuzz@googlemail com website fluffandfuzz@weebly com notes introduction andy is a cute little llama with a cosy saddle blanket andy combines garter and stockinette stitch and the blanket incorporates a slip_stitch colour pattern work flat all pieces are worked flat back and forth on a pair of single pointed knitting needles casting on use the long tail cast on for this pattern unless otherwise instructed yarn pull through to cast off cut the yarn leaving at - this toy was knitted in acrylic dk yarns double least a 30cm tail thread the tail onto a darning knitting light worsted weight 8 ply less than needle sew through the sts on the knitting needle 25g in each of four shades cream brown blue pull the sts off the knitting needle onto the yarn and green gather together tightly and secure - andy was knitted in sirdar hayfield bonus dk stockinette stitch also known as stocking stitch 100% acrylic in shades cream oatmeal denim purl the ws row and knit the rs row and grass garter stitch knit the rs and ws row - any similar dk acrylic yarn is recommended one size andy stands at 14cm tall gauge 24 sts x 32 row for a 10cm x 10cm square needles & notions in stockinette stitch on 3mm needles don t worry about gauge it is not critical for this project - a pair of 3mm us 2½ single pointed needles minimum length 20cm copyright © 2020 amanda berry - a darning or tapestry needle for seaming this free pattern is for personal use only not for resale all patterns designed by amanda berry are protected by - a few handfuls of toy filling international copyright laws any unauthorised copying sharing or reselling will constitute an infringement of copyright - 30cm black embroidery thread to add the all rights reserved i encourage and permit the sharing of this pattern to raise funds for good causes and charities however features reselling this pattern is not permitted andy the llama copyright © 2020 amanda berry page 1 of 3 abbreviations you should have 10 sts in the middle of the knitted piece for the neck rejoin the cream yarn to work byf bring the yarn to the front these 10 sts from row 20 below k knit row 20 to 30 knit k2tog knit two stitches together decrease by 1 cast off all sts kfb knit into front and back increase by 1 p purl head p2tog purl two stitches together decrease by 1 make 1 cast on 10 sts in cream on 3mm needles start at the back of the head in garter stitch rs right side row 1 ws knit slip1 slip the next stitch purl-wise row 2 rs k1 kfb 8 times k1 18 sts st s stitch es row 3 to 10 knit st st stockinette row 11 k2 k2tog 7 times k2 11 sts tyb take the yarn to the back
